message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it.  I'm asking for $90 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $90 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to pay $75 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $82.50.  Let's try to make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $78 for the product.
Bob, I understand you have a budget, but I'm really hoping to get at least $80 for this product.  If you're willing to go up to $80, I'd be happy to make the deal.
